cause.description:
You know those classic rock artists, Led Zeppelin, Pink Floyd, The Who, Aerosmith, etc.
1. some people listen to rap or something else and forget about classics.
2. Classic rock s tarted alot of today's music.
3. Even if you don't want to listen to entirely classic rock, you can still buy a band's hits album and put some some song on your playlist.
cause.name: Save Clasic Rock
